meaningMnemonic:
The <radical>long</radical> radical and the <kanji>long</kanji> kanji are the same! 

This kanji also means <kanji>leader</kanji>, because the longer a person is, the better a leader they'll be. Or maybe it was... the longer they've been somewhere? Whatever, longness = leaderness, you know?
readingMnemonic: You see a very <kanji>long</kanji> person. It's Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう), who has made herself long, like her street. "I made myself long so I can watch more of the street, my domain. I'm the <kanji>leader</kanji> of these streets. Watch yourself not-long person," says Mrs. Chou.
